item.title: My Portfolio
item.description: About me My name is Thomas, and I live in Amiens, France. I’m currently studying computer science (in a BTS SIO), and I’m very interested in computer network administration, as well as in cybersecurity. This site serves as a portfolio, but also as personal notes that I use for the missions I have to accomplish for my studies. The BTS SIO During these two years of BTS, I learned the basic principles of computer networks, the different communication protocols, network architectures and network security.
